DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare analgesic effect topical application lidocaine-prilocaine cream lidocaine infiltration repair postpartum perineal tear .
DOC.brief_title: Pain Relief During Repair Postpartum Perineal Tears
DOC.criteria: 1 . Gestational age > 37 week 2 . Uncomplicated pregnancy 3 . Single vertex fetus 4 . Normal vaginal delivery 5 . Women accept participate study 1 . Women receive epidural analgesia 2 . Women require episiotomy 3 . Women intact perineum 4 . Operative vaginal delivery 5 . Allergy use drug
